Articles.Content:
-Infinite fuel recommended

HELLO GAMERS! these designs were made for style not really purpose but they fly really well especially the Da Vinci. it's just the way I had to design them so they would work and still look the part. I will add the downloads after school today but here's some pictures so you can get exited. I'm also gonna release a 2.0 of the expeimental VTOL, a sea-biplane and a jet VTOL inspired by the osprey.

Da Vinci: a rocket propelled plane based loosely based on one of Da Vinci's Quad wing designs.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/ktint)

Experimental VTOL 1.0 MK 10: Using 4 Rockomax Mark 55 Radial Mount Liquid Engines set at opposing angles for vertical thrust and two Rockomax 24-77 for horizontal thrust I designed an interesting craft. keep it below 1/3 thrust. To land it simply hit backspace to deploy parachutes, cut thrust to 0, and deploy legs. (One use only craft due to lack of way to get back into the cockpit and legs breaking upon landing)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/HfMrK)

Sea-Biplane: glides like a dream. not exactly perfect due to lack of ability to take off once landed. powered by 6 0-10 MonoPropellant Engines. it's a bit tricky to get off the ground but once you do you'll love flying your very own amphibious barnstormer

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/5uo28)

Jet VTOL: inspired by the osprey, this vehicle uses two vertical jet engines. by using SAS you can hold the vtol in an angle. when combined with a weapon mod this vehicle can be used for strafe runs.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/8KUCS)

Experimental VTOL 2.0 (coming soon!)

Sea Biplane 2.0 (coming soon!)

Da Vinci 2.0 (coming soon)

sorry for the delay on these last few craft. some things came up after school and I couldn't reach my computer 

Downloads:

Da Vinci:[http://www./download/9tr5qye6g3byx3n/Da_Vinci.craft](http://www./download/9tr5qye6g3byx3n/Da_Vinci.craft)

update
Err, I think your images are broken. Also, this thread really belongs in Rocket Builders, where different companies offer their crafts and services. Nice, though!

The images are working fine now, it's a problem with imgur.

Looks nice! +rep

I made this post on how to embed images:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/25376-Showcase-KIDI-Kerbal-Interplanetary-Defence-Initiative?p=1820147#post1820147](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/25376-Showcase-KIDI-Kerbal-Interplanetary-Defence-Initiative?p=1820147#post1820147)
Okay downloads are up, ENJOY! the next three will be up later
